channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Building On Foundational AI Models
item.description: The move toward foundation models marks a significant evolution in the AI landscape.

item.title: Getting AI to do your work
item.description: That’s the first step, certainly. If you don’t, your boss will. The second step is to take the time you’ve freed up and do work that the AI can’t do.

item.title: How Shopping Habits Can Reveal Credit Risk To Banks And Insurers
item.description: AI-driven models can be built from the shared data, then tested and used to identify patterns indicative of financial responsibility.
